text: Scientists working in the Horn of Africa have documented the existence of a remarkable little mammal called the Somali elephant shrew — or Somali sengi — for the first time since the 1970s. It's related to elephants. https://t.co/CVOIorTmMg https://t.co/itywWQWxlE

name: CNN
text: Scientists working in the Horn of Africa have documented the existence of a remarkable little mammal called the Somali elephant shrew — or Somali sengi — for the first time since the 1970s. It's closely related to elephants, aardvarks and manatees. https://t.co/LPPHf9s0fj https://t.co/QzaaxoGi6m

name: CNN
text:
"Don't make us write obituaries"

The front page of The Observer, the student newspaper covering the University of Notre Dame and neighboring Saint Mary's College and Holy Cross College, highlights a plea to the community during the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/57MCRwY2vz

name: CNN
text:
The coronavirus pandemic is impacting US prisons. CNN speaks to two women who are demanding proper health care for their loved ones while they are incarcerated, as well as a spokesperson from the Prison Policy Initiative.

Watch "Go There" on Facebook: https://t.co/1Fp8d0DDws https://t.co/AH6qAPgIbz

name: CNN
text:
Members of the New York Mets are quarantining in two different cities after the team reported two Covid-19 cases this week.

The reports of cases led to the postponement of a Thursday game vs. the Miami Marlins and three games against the New York Yankees. https://t.co/JjGTkX0tol
